verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7181>attend<s%> to my <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H5186>bow<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to my <S%H8394>understanding:<s%>
That you may <S%H8104>regard<s%> <S%H4209>discretion,<s%> and that your <S%H8193>lips<s%> may <S%H5341>keep<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
For the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of a <S%H2114>strange<s%> woman <S%H5197>drop<s%> as an <S%H5317>honeycomb,<s%> and her <S%H2441>mouth<s%> is <S%H2513>smoother<s%> than <S%H8081>oil:<s%>
But her <S%H319>end<s%> is <S%H4751>bitter<s%> as <S%H3939>wormwood,<s%> <S%H2299>sharp<s%> as a <S%H6310>two-edged<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
Her <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4194>death;<s%> her <S%H6806>steps<s%> <S%H8551>take<s%> <S%H8551>hold<s%> on <S%H7585>hell.<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> you should <S%H6424>ponder<s%> the <S%H734>path<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> her <S%H4570>ways<s%> are <S%H5128>moveable,<s%> that you can not <S%H3045>know<s%> them.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> me <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, O you <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H5493>depart<s%> not from the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H7368>Remove<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from her, and <S%H7126>come<s%> not <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1004>house:<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> you <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1935>honor<s%> to <S%H312>others,<s%> and your <S%H8141>years<s%> to the <S%H394>cruel:<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with your <S%H3581>wealth;<s%> and your <S%H6089>labors<s%> be in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of a <S%H5237>stranger;<s%>
And you <S%H5098>mourn<s%> at the <S%H319>last,<s%> when your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and your <S%H7607>body<s%> are <S%H3615>consumed,<s%>
And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> have I <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5006>despised<s%> <S%H8433>reproof;<s%>
And have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H3384>teachers,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> my <S%H241>ear<s%> to them that <S%H3925>instructed<s%> me!
I was <S%H4592>almost<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> and <S%H5712>assembly.<s%>
<S%H8354>Drink<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> out of your own <S%H953>cistern,<s%> and <S%H5140>running<s%> waters out of your own <S%H875>well.<s%>
Let your <S%H4599>fountains<s%> be <S%H6327>dispersed<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> and <S%H6388>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets.<s%>
Let them be <S%H905>only<s%> your own, and not <S%H2114>strangers'<s%> with you.
Let your <S%H4726>fountain<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed:<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> with the <S%H802>wife<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

Let her be as the <S%H158>loving<s%> <S%H365>hind<s%> and <S%H2580>pleasant<s%> <S%H3280>roe;<s%> let her <S%H1717>breasts<s%> <S%H7301>satisfy<s%> you at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times;<s%> and be you <S%H7686>ravished<s%> <S%H8548>always<s%> with her <S%H160>love.<s%>
And <S%H4100>why<s%> will you, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> be <S%H7686>ravished<s%> with a <S%H2114>strange<s%> woman, and <S%H2263>embrace<s%> the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of a <S%H5237>stranger?<s%>
For the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> are <S%H5227>before<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he <S%H6424>ponders<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4570>goings.<s%>
His own <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> shall <S%H3920>take<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> himself, and he shall be <S%H8551>held<s%> with the <S%H2256>cords<s%> of his <S%H2403>sins.<s%>
He shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4148>instruction;<s%> and in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of his <S%H200>folly<s%> he shall <S%H7686>go<s%> <S%H7686>astray.<s%>
